a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Premature deaths attributed to smoking per 100,000 individuals.
Smoking death rate in 2021 (deaths per 100,000 people)
Smoking death rate in 1990 (deaths per 100,000 people)
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)

Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is
age-standardized
.
